thread.title: Southend weather warning: Met Office hour-by-hour forecast | Echo
thread.title_full: Southend weather warning: Met Office hour-by-hour forecast | Echo

author: yahoo
title: Southend weather warning: Met Office hour-by-hour forecast | Echo
text:
Southend weather warning: Met Office hour-by-hour forecast Weather By Jessica Day-Parker @JessicaDayPark2 Digital Reporter Share Hour-by-hour forecast as Southend set for disruption amid strong wind warning (Image: Stock image / Met Office) Strong and gusty winds are expected to bring disruption to Southend this weekend as an 18-hour weather warning has been issued.
The Met Office has issued another yellow weather warning for wind, which is expected to cause delays across south Essex on Saturday and the early hours of New Year's Eve.
The forecaster says a "spell of strong and gusty winds will move east across England and Wales, bringing some disruption to travel and services" .
Residents and visitors are warned to expect some train and plane delays, as well as congestion on the roads, with journeys taking longer.
Low pressure will bring more wet and windy weather to the UK and warnings for heavy rain, strong winds and snow have been issued for this weekend ‚ö†Ô∏è
Latest info here üëâ https://t.co/QwDLMfRBfs
Stay #WeatherAware ‚ö†Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/4cysjM1jry
‚Äî Met Office (@metoffice) December 29, 2023 It is also likely that some coastal routes, seafronts and coastal communities will be affected by spray or large waves, the experts predict.
Some short term loss of power and other services is also possible, and delays for high-sided vehicles on exposed routes and bridges are likely.
Here the hour-by-hour forecast in Southend while the warning is in place:
Saturday 11am - Cloudy with gusts of 26mph 12pm - Cloudy with gusts of 27mph 1pm - Gusts pick up to 28mph 2pm and 3pm - Overcast as gusts of 28mph continue 4pm - Overcast with gusts of wind reaching 30mph 5pm - Cloudy with gusts of 33mph 6pm - Overcast again with gusts of 35mph 7pm - Cloudy with gusts of 36mph 8pm - Cloudy with gusts of 38mph 9pm - Overcast as gusts reach high of 39mph 10pm - Cloudy with gusts of 39mph 11pm - Cloudy with gusts of 38mph Sunday 12am - Overcast with 30 per cent chance of rain as gusts reach overall high of 40mph 3am - 90 per cent chance of heavy rain as gusts slow to 31mph Weather Share Comments: Our rules We want our comments to be a lively and valuable part of our community - a place where readers can debate and engage with the most important local issues.
